original_text: In that town was a woman who had done many wrong things. She heard that Jesus was eating a meal at the house of the Pharisee. So she took a small stone jar with oil in it, and she went there. The oil had a very nice smell.
korean_text: 그 동네에 죄를 지은 한 여자가 있어 예수께서 바리새인의 집에 앉아 계심을 알고 향유 담은 옥합을 가지고 와서

sentences.original_text: In that town was a woman
who had done many wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 많은 잘못된 일을 한 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: She heard that Jesus was eating a meal
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 예수께서 식사하시고 계신 것을 들었다

sentences.original_text: at the house of the Pharisee
So she took a small stone jar
The oil had a very nice smell
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기름은 아주 좋은 향기를 냈다
